Literature.Title: Characterization of Milkisin, a Novel Lipopeptide With Antimicrobial Properties Produced By Pseudomonas sp. UCMA 17988 Isolated From Bovine Raw Milk.
Literature.Author: Schlusselhuber M, Godard J, Sebban M, Bernay B, Garon D, Seguin V, Oulyadi H, Desmasures N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus CIP 53.154(MIC=500µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Newport CIP 105629 (MIC=1000µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LMG 7233(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Dublin CIP 7053(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Mbandaka CIP 105859(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Montevideo o CIP 104583(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes WSLC 1685(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 01242T(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium CIP 103014(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Aspergillus niger CMPG 814(MIC=>20000µg/ml),Cladosporium herbarum CMPG 38(MIC=>20000µg/ml),Mucor hiemalis CBS 201.65(MIC=>20000µg/ml),Penicillium expansum CMPG 136(MIC=20000µg/ml)
